0: Story highlights A vigil for the slain officers is set for Monday NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Father recalls his son's passion for policing: "He had this enthusiasm, this fire in his soul" NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Two suspects face capital murder charges; another man charged as an accessory NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR (CNN) It started as a traffic stop and ended in a hail of gunfire. Now two police officers in Hattiesburg, Mississippi, are dead, four suspects are facing charges and a community is mourning. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Officers Benjamin Deen, 34, and Liquori Tate, 24 , were making a traffic stop Saturday evening when they were shot, Mayor Johnny DuPree said. They were taken to a hospital, but did not survive. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Authorities accuse the suspects of fleeing the crime scene, allegedly stealing a police cruiser and using it as a getaway car. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Joanie Calloway, 22, was charged with two counts of capital murder, the Mississippi Bureau of Investigation said Sunday. NEWLINE_CHAR NEWLINE_CHAR Marvin Banks, 29, also faces two counts of capital murder, along with counts of grand theft auto and felon in possession of a firearm. Police charged his brother, Curtis Banks, with two counts of accessory after the fact of capital
